introduction.purpose: Detail the requirements of M1 with regard to the Service Delivery Platform implemented by hSenid.

scope.description: Provides service delivery of content and charging for MobileOne customers and 3rd party service providers.
benefits: Flexible and scalable solution improving efficiency and service creation.
Rapid enhancement of offerings and rich content delivery.
Full SLA-based control for MobileOne as mediator with automated activation.
Reduced time-to-market and cost savings while preserving security.
objectives: Secure Access Gateway to core network
Centralized management of platform & applications with billing, rating, and payments
Support for synchronous mediation, routing, throughput control, logging, multi-protocol, provisioning, CDR generation, reporting, and dashboards

introduction.overview: This SRS includes Phase 1 and Phase 2 requirements, structured by component.

general.REQ-SLA-GEN-1: Two types of SLAs: Service Provider SLA, Application SLA
general.REQ-SLA-GEN-2: Each SLA includes general info on SP/Application and per-NCS info
general.REQ-SLA-GEN-3: SP SLA enforced before application SLA
general.REQ-SLA-GEN-4: Application SLA cannot exceed SP SLA limits

service_provider_sla.REQ-SP-SLA-1: Agreement between SDP and Service Provider

application_sla.REQ-APP-SLA-2: Two SLA versions per application: Production & Testbed
